name: google-slides-recording-api
description: Production-ready API for automated Google Slides presentation recording

scripts.install-deps: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y xvfb google-chrome-stable ffmpeg nodejs npm fluxbox
scripts.check-deps: node -e "console.log('Checking dependencies...'); const deps=['xvfb-run','google-chrome','ffmpeg','node']; deps.forEach(d => { try { require('child_process').execSync('which '+d, {stdio:'ignore'}); console.log('✓ '+d); } catch { console.log('✗ '+d+' (missing)'); } });"
